name: Cozy Harvest
description:
Hello there! After long years you could finally afford that little garden spot you always wanted. 

Being a big friend of nature, you decided to do  your part and bring Happiness to as many wild animals as you can!

A calm little farming game with a high score system. Sit back and relax while you try to maximize food production and victory points.

Tested in Chrome on PC, but apparently works quite well on mobile devices too - text will be tiny though.

Playtime: ~15 min

Please enjoy :)
